## PENALTIES (RA 11058)

**Administrative Fines per violation:**

| Establishment Size | 1st Offense | 2nd Offense | 3rd+ Offense |
|-------------------|-------------|-------------|---------------|
| Micro (1-9) | PHP 20,000 | PHP 50,000 | PHP 100,000 |
| Small (10-99) | PHP 50,000 | PHP 100,000 | PHP 250,000 |
| Medium (100-199) | PHP 100,000 | PHP 250,000 | PHP 500,000 |
| Large (200+) | PHP 100,000 | PHP 500,000 | PHP 5,000,000 |

**Criminal Liability:**
- Willful violation causing death/serious injury
- Imprisonment: 6 months to 6 years
- Additional fine: PHP 1,000,000 to PHP 5,000,000

**Key Points:**
- Each violation counted separately
- Daily fines for continuing violations
- Work stoppage orders for imminent danger
